title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Per capita consumption in pounds, with a total of 19 data points.
Overall Per capita consumption in pounds has increased over the Year
Per capita consumption in pounds is gradually constant from 2000 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Per capita consumption in pounds about 15.0 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Per capita consumption in pounds about 8.0 was recorded at Year 2001
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Per capita consumption in pounds, with a total of 19 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2014 to 2018.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2006 to 2010.
But, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2000 to 2004.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2014.
Differently, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2010 to 2012.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2004 to 2006.
